name: Missile Input
description:
UFO sightings have grown exponentially the last few months, and the Secret Service is spread too thin to devise convincing cover-ups for all of them. The solution? Enlist the help of Lucas Brazier; a former brass worker turned surface-to-air missile specialist. As the newest recruit in the fleet of AA-privateers, your job is to shoot down any and all UFOs spotted in the sky.

Will You Follow Orders?





  • Typing gameplay with multiple difficulties

  • Special missiles and equipment to buy

  • Two factions to help or destroy

  • Unlockable extras, including Boss Rush, Survival and Target Library

  • Aliens






Missile Input features the musical work of Nicolas.

  • Halfway Home
  • East of Eden
  • I don't want to live in a world without you
  • Hope
  • Archon Ladabaoth
  • Pure Pleroma
  • Basilides Lost Exegetica
